key.name: theme-enabled
key.description: Enable or disable the GNOME for Firefox theme

key.name: hide-single-tab
key.description: Hide the tab bar when only one tab is open

key.name: normal-width-tabs
key.description: Use the same tab width as default Firefox

key.name: swap-tab-close
key.description: Prevent Tab Close button from following the position of the window controls

key.name: bookmarks-toolbar-under-tabs
key.description: Move the Bookmarks toolbar underneath tabs bar

key.name: tabs-as-headerbar
key.description:
Place the tabs on the top of the window, and use the tabs bar to hold the window controls, like Firefox's standard tab bar
NOTE: Enabling with "Hide Single Tab" will replace the single tab with a title bar

key.name: active-tab-contrast
key.description: Add more contrast to the active tab

key.name: close-only-selected-tabs
key.description: Only show the close button on the selected tab

key.name: symbolic-tab-icons
key.description: Make all tab icons look kinda like symbolic icons

key.name: hide-webrtc-indicator
key.description: Hide redundant WebRTC indicator since GNOME provides their own privacy icons in the top right

key.name: no-themed-icons
key.description: Use Firefox's default icons instead of themed Adwaita icons

key.name: oled-black
key.description: Use an OLED-friendly, pure black as the dark theme
